nodes.name: Unique Tombs
nodes.summary: A plugin that retextures all of the Velothi meshes found in vanilla tombs while leaving all of the other Velothi architecture untouched, with example textures fusing Connary's "Veloth's Sons" and "Sewers, the Humid Realm." With some

nodes.name: Better Scamps
nodes.summary: A pluginless mesh replacer for the scamp creature which attempts to fix the UV mapping (distortion, seams, symmetry, random mistakes, and—for some reason—the teeth being mapped onto the lips). Also included are vanilla-esque versions of

nodes.name: Correct UV Mudcrabs
nodes.summary: A fixed Mudcrab mesh, reducing distortion and other UV errors.

nodes.name: Better Skulls
nodes.summary: Updated to the most recent version, with new meshes (from the skeleton creature) for the statics, misc. objects, and lights involving skulls—carefully aligned with the original meshes to hopefully sit almost identically in-game.  Also, a
